name: NKIssueContentStatus
desc: The status of the newsstand issue.

items.name: case none
items.desc: Assets are not downloading for the issue and there is no content at contentURL.

items.name: case downloading
items.desc: The issue has assets that are currently downloading.

items.name: case available
items.desc: Downloading of assets is not taking place and there is issue content at contentURL.
